  • Classes in com.amazonaws.athena.connector.credentials used by com.amazonaws.athena.connector.credentials 
    Class Description
    Credentials
    Represents a set of credentials required to authenticate and connect to a database.
    CredentialsProvider
    Provider interface for database credentials.
    DefaultCredentials
    Encapsulates database connection user name and password information.
    InitializableCredentialsProvider
    Extended contract for credentials providers that require initialization with configuration from AWS Secrets Manager.
  • Classes in com.amazonaws.athena.connector.credentials used by com.amazonaws.athena.connector.lambda.handlers
